newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - MetaTools estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - MetaTools estimates cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Chris Galvin cut his earnings estimates for MetaTools Inc after the computer software company pre-announced first quarter earnings of nil to $0.01 a share on revenues of $6.1-$6.2 million.
-- Galvin cut his 1997 earnings estimate to $0.35 a share from $0.50 and his 1998 estimate to $0.65 from $0.75.

-- In a statement, Galvin said the shortfall was attributed to the company's inabiity to ship an original equipment manufacturer (OEM) version of its "Kai's Photo Soap" software, and slowing sales of some older products.
